pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pangeo-forge-cordex[![github CI](https://github.com/euro-cordex/pangeo-forge-cordex/actions/workflows/ci.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/euro-cordex/pangeo-forge-cordex/actions/workflows/ci.yaml)[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/pangeo-forge-cordex.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/pangeo-forge-cordex)Pangeo force recipe creation for CORDEX datasets.
